Deepika Says Ranveer Is A Different Person At Home, Wonders What Happens When He Steps Outside!
Deepika Says Ranveer Is A Different Person At Home, Wonders What Happens When He Steps Outside!
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh give couple goals a whole new definition. The lovebirds are head over heels in love with each other since last 6 years and it looks like it will last forever.
Twitter
During the course of their relationship, Ranveer openly showered his love for Deepika, while DP chose to keep it a secret. But now after their marriage, the actress never shies away from talking about her beloved husband and we love it.
At a recent event in Mumbai, Deepika was asked about Ranveer’s magnificent energy that he has, to which she replied,
“I don’t know what happens when he leaves the house as he’s an extremely different person which I think people will also start seeing. Like if you see him in his work mode, which is that, there’s an extremely quiet side to him, there’s an extremely intelligent side to him, there’s a very sensitive and emotional side to him, there’s a vulnerable childlike innocence, so there are so many facets to him”.
The wifey is all praises for her hubby.
She even joked that she doesn’t mix anything in his coconut water which he has every morning. These two are just LOVE.

Talking about life after marriage, Ranveer had said, “I’m loving it and highly recommend it. I have been married to Deepika in my head for years now. Just a few months into our relationship, I knew she was the one for me and I wanted to spend the rest of my life with her. I had committed my life to her well before the rituals. I was waiting for her to be ready for it”.
Clearly, Ranveer and Deepika are giving all the lovers major marriage goals.
